ExtensionInfoDescription.message: Travian 4 extension that adds some 'missing' features to game.

TravianSelectVillage.description: Used in places where there is need to select players village.

TravianTotalIncoming.description: Total income text used in marketplace incoming resources table.

TravianIncomingFrom.description: Incoming from text used in marketplace incoming resources table.

TravianVillagesLC.description: General purpose word for villages in lower-case.

TravianSelectAll.description: Used on selecting multiple checkboxes or units.

TravianNever.description: General purpose for something that will never happen.
